code:
stateDiagram-v2
    [Education_StudentDB] --> Empty: Component mount
    Empty --> BuildingFilter: Add first field
    BuildingFilter --> BuildingFilter: Modify fields
    BuildingFilter --> Validating: Field change
    Validating --> Valid: Validation success
    Validating --> Invalid: Validation failure
    Valid --> BuildingFilter: Continue editing
    Invalid --> BuildingFilter: Fix errors

    BuildingFilter --> PresetSelected: Select preset
    PresetSelected --> Validating: Apply preset

    BuildingFilter --> TemplateSaving: Save as template
    TemplateSaving --> BuildingFilter: Template saved

    Empty --> TemplateLoading: Load template
    TemplateLoading --> Validating: Template loaded

    Valid --> Exporting: Export filter
    Exporting --> [Education_LMS_Portal]: Filter exported

    BuildingFilter --> Importing: Import JSON
    Importing --> Validating: Parse JSON

    note right of Validating
        Real-time validation
        using NostrFilterSchema
        and custom rules
    end note

    note right of Valid
        Filter is ready
        to use for
        subscriptions
    end note
